nodes.text: The  Bilbousa saloon was located on the planet Nal Hutta. During the Clone Wars, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and his Padawan Ahsoka Tano traveled to the saloon to find information on a group of bounty hunters that included Cad Bane, Moralo Eval, and Rako Hardeen, who, unbeknownst to the two Jedi, was Obi-Wan Kenobi in disguise. Skywalker forced his way through the Gamorrean guards posted at the door before interrogating the Ithorian bartender, using a Force choke when the Ithorian tried to extort him. The pair left as soon as they learned that the fugitives had recently purchased a ship and left.

The saloon's indoor and outdoor areas were packed with dozens of individuals of a variety of alien species. In addition to the outdoor seating, the inside of the saloon, although it had very little lighting and featured floors covered with trash, was very lively, with Twi'lek performers entertaining patrons.
